metadata.titleEn: WATER: Dataset of airborne WiDAS mission in the national observatory on climatology at Zhangye-Zhangye  flight zone on Jun. 29, 2008
metadata.titleCn: 黑河综合遥感联合试验：观象台-张掖飞行区机载WiDAS数据集（2008年6月29日）
metadata.description:
The dataset of airborne WiDAS mission was obtained in the national observatory on climatology at Zhangye-Zhangye flight zone on Jun. 29, 2008.
     Intra-band data available for general users include Level-2C data (after geometric, radiometric and atmospheric corrections), Level-1B browse image (after intra-band matching) and Level-2B browse image (after registration). The raw data, Level-1A, and data processing parameters were filed; applications would be evaluated prior to access. Data processing started in Aug. 2008 and ended in Apr. 2009, and in Nov. 2009, CCD data were reprocessed to adjust radiometric calibration. 
     The flying time of each route was as follows:

{|
! id
! flight
! relative height
! starttime
! endtime
! data size
! data state
! data quality
! ground targets 
|-
| 1 || 2#5 || 1500m || 13:14:39 || 13:22:43 || 122 || processed;complete || good || National observatory on climatology at Zhangye;Gulou in Zhangye 
|-
| 2 || 2#7 || 1500m || 13:28:23 || 13:35:31 || 108 || processed;complete || good
|-　 
| 3 || 2#9 || 1500m || 13:41:11 || 13:49:03 || 119 || processed;complete || good || wetland park in Zhangye
|}
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集为机载WiDAS传感器于2008年06月29日获取，地点在观象台-张掖飞行区。
原始数据经过几何校正、辐射定标和大气校正后发布，面向普通用户的数据产品为Level-2C产品（经过几何校正、辐射定标和大气校正），以及Level-1B（波段间配准）快视图和Level-2B（波段间配准）快视图。原始数据（Level-1A数据）和数据处理参数存档，需提交申请并通过审批后才能获得。数据处理时间为2008年8月-2009年4月，完成时间为2009年4月，2009年11月做了一次CCD相机辐射定标的订正。
本数据集的原始数据包括3条航线。各航线的飞行时间如下表：
{|
! 序号
! 航线名称
! 相对航高
! 开始时间
! 结束时间
! 数据量（景）
! 数据状态
! 数据质量
! 主要地面目标 
|-
| 1 || 2#5 || 约1500米 || 13:14:39 || 13:22:43 || 122 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 张掖国家气候观象台，张掖市鼓楼 
|-
| 2 || 2#7 || 约1500米 || 13:28:23 || 13:35:31 || 108 || 完整，已处理 || 好
|-　 
| 3 || 2#9 || 约1500米 || 13:41:11 || 13:49:03 || 119 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 张掖市湿地公园
|}

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific features and processing levels of data collected using airborne WiDAS sensors?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 使用空中WiDAS传感器收集的数据的具体特征和处理级别是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: geometric correction, radiometric calibration, atmospheric correction, Level-1B, Level-2B, Level-2C, Level-1A data, processing parameters archived
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 几何校正、辐射定标、大气校正、Level-1B、Level-2B、Level-2C、Level-1A数据、处理参数存档

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many flight paths are included in a dataset acquired by an airborne WiDAS sensor over the specified area?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在指定区域内，通过空中WiDAS传感器获取的数据集中包含多少条飞行路径？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the definition of 'Level-2C products' in the context of remote sensing data processing?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在遥感数据处理的背景下，“Level-2C产品”的定义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Level-2C products refer to data products that have undergone geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction, making them suitable for general user applications.
Definition.AnswerCn: Level-2C 产品是指经过几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正的数据产品，适合一般用户应用。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors could influence the need for multiple levels of data processing, such as geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction, in remote sensing data collection efforts?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响遥感数据采集工作中需要多个数据处理层次（如几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正）的因素包括哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The need for multiple levels of data processing, including geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction, in remote sensing data collection efforts could be influenced by the desire to ensure data accuracy and usability for various applications. Geometric correction is necessary to align the data spatially, radiometric calibration ensures that the sensor readings correspond to actual physical quantities, and atmospheric correction accounts for the effects of the atmosphere on the sensor data. These steps are essential in producing a Level-2C product that is suitable for general use, as seen in the data collection efforts for the airborne WiDAS sensor flights over the Zhangye flight district.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在遥感数据收集工作中，多个数据处理层次的需求，包括几何校正、辐射定标和大气校正，可能受到确保数据准确性和适用性以满足各种应用的影响。几何校正是必要的，以便在空间上对齐数据；辐射定标确保传感器读数与实际物理量相对应；大气校正则考虑了大气对传感器数据的影响。这些步骤对于生成适合一般使用的Level-2C产品至关重要，正如在张掖飞行区的机载WiDAS传感器飞行数据收集工作中所见。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of implementing geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction on the quality and usability of aerial remote sensing data collected at approximately 1500 meters altitude?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 实施几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正对在约1500米高度收集的航空遥感数据的质量和可用性可能产生的结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Implementing geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction on aerial remote sensing data can lead to enhanced data quality and usability. These processes improve the accuracy of spatial positioning (geometric correction), ensure consistent brightness and color (radiometric calibration), and compensate for atmospheric conditions (atmospheric correction) that may alter data readings. As a result, the processed data can be more reliably used for various analyses, such as climate observation and urban planning, by providing clearer and more accurate representations of the observed areas, such as the Zhangye National Climate Observatory and other sites in Zhangye.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 对航空遥感数据进行几何校正、辐射定标和大气校正可以提高数据质量和可用性。这些过程提高了空间定位的准确性（几何校正），确保亮度和颜色的一致性（辐射定标），并补偿可能改变数据读数的大气条件（大气校正）。因此，处理后的数据可以更可靠地用于各种分析，如气候观察和城市规划，通过提供更清晰、更准确的观察区域表示，例如张掖国家气候观测站及张掖的其他地点。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary goals of processing airborne WiDAS sensor data to Level-2C products, including geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 处理机载WiDAS传感器数据到Level-2C产品的主要目标是什么，包括几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goals of processing airborne WiDAS sensor data to Level-2C products, including geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction, are to provide accurate, reliable, and user-friendly data products for general users. This involves ensuring data quality by correcting for distortions and variability introduced during data acquisition, allowing for precise analysis and application in monitoring and studying various ground targets such as climate observatories and urban or wetland areas.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 处理空气WiDAS传感器数据到Level-2C产品的主要目标，包括几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正，是为了为一般用户提供准确、可靠和用户友好的数据产品。这涉及通过纠正数据采集过程中引入的失真和变异性来确保数据质量，从而允许对各种地面目标（如气候观测站和城市或湿地地区）的精确分析和应用。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What steps are involved in preparing airborne sensor data for analysis, specifically focusing on geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction procedures?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 准备机载传感器数据进行分析涉及哪些步骤，特别是几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data from the airborne WiDAS sensor undergoes several preprocessing steps before being released. The original data is first subjected to geometric correction, followed by radiometric calibration to ensure the accuracy of the sensor's readings. Finally, atmospheric correction is applied to account for the influence of the atmosphere on the captured data. The processed data is made available as Level-2C products, which include all these corrections, as well as Level-1B and Level-2B quick views with band-to-band registration. Original Level-1A data and processing parameters are archived and can be accessed upon request and approval.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 来自机载WiDAS传感器的数据在发布之前经过几个预处理步骤。原始数据首先进行几何校正，然后进行辐射校准，以确保传感器读数的准确性。最后，应用大气校正，以考虑大气对捕获数据的影响。处理后的数据以Level-2C产品的形式提供，其中包括所有这些校正，以及带有波段间配准的Level-1B和Level-2B快速浏览图像。原始Level-1A数据和处理参数被归档，并可在请求和批准后访问。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data processing techniques enable the transformation of raw airborne sensor data into user-friendly data products in remote sensing applications?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些数据处理技术能够将原始航空传感器数据转化为遥感应用中的用户友好数据产品？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The transformation of raw airborne sensor data into user-friendly data products involves several processing techniques, including geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction. These processes lead to the creation of Level-2C products that are geometrically corrected, radiometrically calibrated, and atmospherically corrected, as well as quick-look images for Level-1B and Level-2B data. Original Level-1A data and processing parameters are archived and require approval for access.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 将原始空气传感器数据转化为用户友好的数据产品涉及多个处理技术，包括几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正。这些过程导致创建Level-2C产品，这些产品经过几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正，以及Level-1B和Level-2B数据的快速浏览图像。原始Level-1A数据和处理参数被归档，并需要获得批准才能访问。
